page.title: 11GROUP 4 SECURITY BROADWAY
page.content: {Group 4}is a nationwide company specialising in all aspects of security with headquarters above Broadway. It comprises four main areas.{Foxhill Manor}with an exhibition room covering the entire range of services and products. {Farncombe Manor}which is mainly administrative and contains the dining room where staff are provided with a free lunch daily. The{Dormy House {Hotel}with a conference centre providing full conference and dancing and banqueting facilities for 200 people.{Converted farm buildings}and carefully screened new buildings which house a training school handling over 1000 students yearly and also a print shop and maintenance workshop for the company's vehicles. Facilities include a tennis court, games room. sauna and television room.
